channel.title: Help please
channel.description: Could not connect to mysql database: Lost connection to MySQL server at 'reading initial communication packet', system error: 110 what am i doing wrong i added vote4cash

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

If you haven’t changed the mysql database name, user and pass in the vote.php file then add them.

If you have them added then you have clearly done them wrong.

Read full topic
